alphabetsoup.framework
Class Word

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.framework.Word

public class Word
extends java.lang.Object

The class Word contains Letter objects that make up a word that must be completed. Word also keeps track of the Letter objects given to it for the purpose of completing the word.

Author:
Chris Hazard

Constructor Detail

Word

public Word(java.lang.String s,
            java.util.List<LetterColor> colors)
Builds a word colored according to the specified distribution

Parameters:
s - String of word to build
colors - Map with keys being Letter.Color, and values being a float representing the corresponding probability that the Color will be selected. The probabilities specified should add up to 1.0.

Word

public Word(Letter[] letters)
Builds a word colored according to the arrays of letters

Parameters:
letters - array of letters to build the new word from
